StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_SSRS_O.cerSelec.onBoardRankResults]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body: ( @BOARDID VARCHAR(500) ) AS BEGIN SELECT ISNULL(PG.RANK_CODE, 'No Prior') as [RANK_CODE] ,COUNT(CASE WHEN ((OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 5)) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM RANK SELECTED' ,COUNT(CASE WHEN ((OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 4)) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM RANK NON-SELECTED' ,COUNT(CASE WHEN (PG.RANK_CODE IS NOT NULL) THEN 1 END) AS 'HIDE_FLAG' --INTO ##RPTOFCBOARDSTATISTICS FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN OFFICER_CONTRACT_BOARD OCB ON B.BOARD_ID = OCB.BOARD_ID INNER JOIN OFFICER_CONTRACT OC ON OCB.OFFICER_CONTRACT_ID = OC.CONTRACT_ID INNER JOIN OFFICER_CONTRACT_BOARD_STATUS_HISTORY OCBSH ON OCB.CONTRACT_BOARD_ID = OCBSH.CONTRACT_BOARD_ID AND OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID IN (3,4,5) AND OCBSH.STATUS_DATE IN (SELECT MAX(STATUS_DATE) FROM OFFICER_CONTRACT_BOARD_STATUS_HISTORY OCBSH2 WHERE OCBSH2.BOARD_STATUS_ID IN (3,4,5) AND OCBSH2.CONTRACT_BOARD_ID = OCBSH.CONTRACT_BOARD_ID) INNER JOIN NWA N ON OC.NWA_ID = N.NWA_ID INNER JOIN MARINE_CANDIDATE MC ON N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = MC.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID INNER JOIN PERSON P ON MC.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = P.PERSON_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MARINE M ON M.MARINE_ID = P.PERSON_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN PAY_GRADE PG ON PG.PAY_GRADE_CODE = M.PRESENT_GRADE_CODE WHERE B.BOARD_ID IN (select * from dbo.SplitList(@BOARDID,',')) and OC.BOARD_STATUS_ID > 1 GROUP BY PG.RANK_CODE END
